text: Motion
Motion
Motion

~~~~~!
Finally, finally...!

──Hah!
We don't look weird, right!?

──...I-I made sure to perfect everything before leaving home,
so it should be fine!
Thank you~!

Wowww!!
Both of you look like dolls! So cute!!

I'm Mei Izumi!
Nice to meet you, dollies~!

Ah... Thank you, Mei-chan♡
I think you're healthy and wonderful too.
And Fuyu is called Fuyuko Mayuzumi──

Fuyuko-chan, right!
Nice to meet you, nice to meet you~~!

I'm Asahi Serizawa!
Nice to meet you~

Mei-chan, your hair is in different colors!
Amazing, it's beautiful!

Really!? Is it true!? I dyed it again just for today~
I'm so happy to be praised!

Then I'll praise you more!
Hmm, let's see──

B-Both of you...!
──The producer might be pretending to talk about something...

Yeah... Then let's reiterate──
I want to talk about our future activities.

Actually, it's been decided that we'll do a mini-live,
and we'll also collaborate with a shop to promote our CD.
A mini-live...!

Yeah, let's make it a great event with everyone's cooperation!
────Everyone from "Straylight"!
There are no customers at all~~~!?
